cast.overview: After receiving an exotic small animal as a Christmas gift, a young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet, which unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous creatures on a small town.
cast.title: Gremlins

details.biography: Phoebe Belle Cates (born July 16, 1963) is an American actress, model, and entrepreneur best known for her roles in several teen films, most notably Fast Times at Ridgemont High (1982) and Gremlins (1984). Her last movie acting role was in The Anniversary Party (2001). Cates has been married to actor Kevin Kline since 1989; they have two children.
details.name: Phoebe Cates
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
